items.title: American Express (AXP) Rises As Market Takes a Dip: Key Facts
items.description: American Express (AXP) closed the most recent trading day at $322.53, moving +1.11% from the previous trading session.

items.title: American Express Announces 2025 Preliminary Stress Capital Buffer Requirement
items.description: NEW YORK, July 01, 2025--American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) today announced that the Federal Reserve set the company’s preliminary Stress Capital Buffer ("SCB") requirement at 2.5 percent, effective October 1, 2025 through September 30, 2026, based on the results of the 2025 Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review process. This is the minimum SCB requirement under the applicable regulations and is consistent with American Express’ previously disclosed SCB in effect through September 30, 2025

items.title: Attempts to kill DEI have inadvertently made corporate diversity stronger

items.title: Will American Express (AXP) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
items.description: American Express (AXP) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
